summary: Two best friends being convinced that they are not in love search for each other's love.
cast: Imran Khan|Genelia D'Souza|Manjari Fadnnis|Ayaz Khan|Karan Makhija|Sugandha Garg|Nirav Mehta|Alishka Varde|Renuka Kunzru|Prateik|Anuradha Patel|Jayant Kripalani|Ratna Pathak Shah|Padam Bhola|Shakun Batra|Naseeruddin Shah|Jerrit John|Sohail Khan|Arbaaz Khan|Paresh Rawal|Omprakash|Rajat Kapoor|Kitu Gidwani|Urvashi Shah|Uditanshu Mehta|Deepak Dadhwal|Veena Mehta|Murli Sharma|Avantika Malik Khan
title: Jaane Tu... Ya Jaane Na
